deployment_relevant_files: scripts/create_clickhouse_kafka_integration.sh (uses `avn service integration-create` / `integration-update` to configure ClickHouse-Kafka integration)
scripts/create_clickhouse_view.sql (creates ClickHouse materialized view from Kafka integration table)
architectural_resources: Aiven for ClickHouse service (managed ClickHouse database)
Aiven for Kafka service (managed Kafka cluster/topics)
Aiven for PostgreSQL service (managed PostgreSQL database)
ClickHouse-Kafka service integration (ClickHouse reads from Kafka topics)
Container image usage: clickhouse/clickhouse-client (Docker run in scripts/aiven-clickhouse-client.sh)
External realtime data source: Digitransit realtime API (per README)
